summary: Home inspection checklist app with light mode. User is adding three new inspection items: washer drain security (plumbing/laundry), carbon monoxide testing for gas appliances (safety/appliances), and hot water arrival time (plumbing/water heater).

existing_features.title: Add a new checklist item 'Is the washer drain properly secured in the drain pipe?' to the plumbing/laundry section of the checklist form. This should follow the same YesNoField pattern used by other items in that section.

Add a new checklist item 'If there are any gas burning appliances, test for Carbon Monoxide.' to the safety/appliances section of the checklist form. This should follow the same YesNoField pattern used by other items in that section.

Add a new checklist item 'When turning the water on, how long does it take for the hot water to arrive?' to the plumbing/water heater section of the checklist form. This item should use a text input field (not a yes/no field) to allow the inspector to enter a duration or description.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add 'Is the washer drain properly secured in the drain pipe?' to plumbing/laundry section
Add 'If there are any gas burning appliances, test for Carbon Monoxide.' to safety/appliances section
Add 'When turning the water on, how long does it take for the hot water to arrive?' to plumbing/water heater section
